name: SEER Mets
title: SEER Mets
notes:
**Note 1:**  Both extension to and discontinuous metastasis to any of the following pelvic organs are considered FIGO Stage II and coded in SEER Primary Tumor as regional (code 200): adnexa, NOS; bladder, bladder serosa; broad ligament (mesovarium); cul de sac; contralateral fallopian tube; omentum; parametrium; pelvic peritoneum; pelvic wall; rectum; sigmoid colon; sigmoid mesentery; small intestine; ureter; uterus; uterine serosa. 

**Note 2:**  Both extension to and discontinuous metastasis to any of the following abdominal organs are considered FIGO Stage III and coded in SEER Mets: abdominal mesentery; diaphragm; gallbladder; infracolic omentum; kidneys; large intestine except rectum and sigmoid colon; liver (peritoneal surface); pancreas; pericolic gutter; peritoneum, NOS;  spleen; stomach; ureters.

**Note 3:**  The Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stages are included for coding where no more specific information is available in the record.
